mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_ID, r.ACCOUNTID, r.STOREID, r.REVIEWCONTENT, r.WRITEDATE, r.TASTELEVEL, r.PRICELEVEL, r.SERVICELEVEL, r.MOODLEVEL, r.CONVENIENCELEVEL, r.LIKECOUNT, r.HATECOUNT, ifnull(l.ISLIKE,0) as 'ISLIKE', a.NICKNAME, a.FOLLOWCOUNT, a.REVIEWCOUNT FROM REVIEW r LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM LIKEHATE WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{ACCOUNTID}) l ON(r.REVIEW_ID = l.REVIEW_ID AND r.ACCOUNTID = l.ACCOUNT_ID) JOIN ACCOUNT a ON a.ACCOUNT_ID = r.ACCOUNTID WHERE r.STOREID = #{STOREID} ORDER BY FIELD(r.ACCOUNTID,#{ACCOUNTID}) DESC, r.LIKECOUNT DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKEHATE(review_id, account_id, isLike) VALUES(#{REVIEW_ID}, #{ACCOUNT_ID}, #{ISLIKE})
mapper.update: UPDATE LIKEHATE SET isLike=#{ISLIKE } WHERE review_id = #{REVIEW_ID} AND account_id = #{ACCOUNT_ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKEHATE WHERE review_id = #{REVIEW_ID} AND account_id = #{ACCOUNT_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET likeCount = #{LIKECOUNT} WHERE review_id = #{REVIEW_ID}
UPDATE REVIEW SET hateCount = #{HATECOUNT} WHERE review_id = #{REVIEW_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT likeCount FROM REVIEW WHERE review_id = #{id}
SELECT hateCount FROM REVIEW WHERE review_id = #{id}
